Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Feb 2019Hi,For the past 27 and 10 years, the STI index had compound at a rate of 2.98% and 7.39% respectively. Hence, the expected rate should be between 2.98% and 7.39%. Do note that the figure is excluding dividend. 0 comments0

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 19 Feb 2019Not very high annually compared to counterparts like Malaysia and Hong Kong. If you're keen in investing in SGX (without exposure to currency risk), try looking for low-med cap stocks as those have the highest growth potential here.0 comments0
